summary: An internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, sent on July 23, 2019, reporting that Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell the previous night, possibly due to a suicide attempt. The email is marked as high importance and offers to provide further information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email, reported as having been found unresponsive in his cell, possibly due to a suicide attempt.

events.title: Epstein Found Unresponsive in Cell
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell, with the email suggesting it was possibly a suicide attempt.

keyFacts: The email, dated July 23, 2019, reports that Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell the previous night.
The incident is described as possibly being a suicide attempt.
The communication is internal to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York and is marked as high importance.
